0: Next we received a call telling us our family room was double booked
we are not a family who generally enjoy organised resorts or beach holidays in general but this was a fantastic experience

For the record the restaurants are Italian good aps horrible main courses Asian very good Fire fancy expensive restaurant and was not on our list Tapas good casual easy but if you may eat lunch there a lot Pacific excellent breakfast buffet only open for dinner on special holidays and is exorbitant
Since most people book their trips well before that the reservations do not match with the openings
There seemed to be a few more families with younger children at the new pool and so now with adult children we stayed around the bigger pool which was a lot quieter
The next day we did a 12 day snorkel trip arranged by the hotel
When we tried to book a snorkeling trip to the Great Barrier Reef the person at the concierge was unfamiliar with the offerings could not give information regarding availability as was plain useless
Plus it is pretty poor to offer just one trip to the Reef in a 5 day period during high season

We later were told the trips to the Barrier Reef were booked and that we should have booked when we booked the hotel yet at no point during the hotel reservation process were we given the opportunity to book activities or warned that availability was limited
The activities staff was misinformed about hiking about trips around the island
1: We were having a family celebration so that suited us
We have stayed at other hotels within the OneOnly group over the past years
We arrived to HTI airport after a 40hrs trip
Ideal resort for a discerning family
The staff are absolutely amazing and certainly made this trip one of the most memorable ones we have been on
Aquazure Pool for the families is fantastic the kids loved it
Thanks One Only for a great long weekend which will be remembered for years to come not just by our group I am sure but the staff as well
